name: Q (itch) (snowbird17)
description:
In this Twine game, you play as Q, a writing assistant similar to Clippy. But you're not going to be annoying anyone about writing letters. In fact, your user actually NEEDS your help writing a letter. Will you stay and help? Or will you go see what lies beyond the writing application?

This game was made as a final project for an Interactive Narrative class at NYU in the spring 2019 semester.
